title: Should I upgrade to OS X El Capitan?
body: Is it worth upgrading to EL Capitan? Is the game playable?

replies.body: I just upgraded and notice no change at all. Perhaps it's no longer causing the issues it did. I did read a lot of reviews of people saying not to upgrade.

Unfortunately, we can't give any direct advice on whether you should or should not upgrade.  In a holistic sense, OS upgrades for Macs usually include further improvements.  At the end of the day, it's entirely up to you!

It's funny you say that. I got a response back from Fraye The Fae, a riot support specialist, and he/she suggested I upgrade. I did upgrade just now and noticed no difference. I am still experiencing the same FPS drops.

If the game works fine on your current version of OS X, then don't do it. Speaking from personal experience, my Late-2013 15" Retina Macbook Pro is currently running OS X El Capitan v.10.11.14, and I still experience latency/lag during team fights in game. This bug has been occurring on OS X El Capitan for me since patch 6.6.
Not in terms in the FPS bug thingy. Mine fixed wayyy back when they said they would patch it. In terms of the mac it self, it looks ugly and it kinda changed my league experience.
